requirement_tested: Frontend application with pages for band listings, band profiles, advertiser ads, registration, and login
user_persona: A music enthusiast named Alex who wants to discover new bands.
user_goal: Alex wants to browse the band listings and view a specific band's profile.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Band Listings
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the website and sees the navigation bar. He wants to find bands, so he clicks on the 'Browse Bands' link.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Browse Bands' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads the band listings, showing a grid of band cards with names, images, and short bios.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing a Band Profile
narrative_steps.description: Alex finds a band that interests him and clicks on their card to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a band card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is redirected to the band's profile page, which displays the band's bio, image, audio samples, and embedded YouTube videos.

requirement_tested: Backend API server to manage bands, advertisers, and advertisements data
user_persona: A developer testing the backend API for band data.
user_goal: Verify that the backend API correctly returns a list of bands.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Band Data
narrative_steps.description: The developer sends a GET request to the bands endpoint to retrieve all registered bands.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to '/api/bands'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The API responds with a JSON array containing band objects with their details such as name, bio, and media links.

requirement_tested: Database connection to PostgreSQL using environment variables: DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME
user_persona: A system administrator deploying the application.
user_goal: Ensure the application connects to the PostgreSQL database using the correct environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: The admin checks that the backend service initializes and connects to the PostgreSQL database using the specified environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend service with the provided environment variables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend logs indicate a successful connection to the PostgreSQL database at localhost:5432 with the given credentials.

requirement_tested: Band registration form capturing band name, bio, picture link, audio sample links, and YouTube video links
user_persona: A band member named Jordan who wants to register the band online.
user_goal: Jordan wants to register his band by filling out the registration form.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Registration Form
narrative_steps.description: Jordan navigates to the registration page to sign up his band.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the '/register' page and select 'Band Registration'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A form titled 'Band Registration' appears with fields for Band Name, Bio, Picture Link, Audio Sample Links, and YouTube Video Links.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Band Information
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills in all required fields with accurate information and submits the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the form fields and click the 'Register Band' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form data is sent via POST request to '/api/bands/register', and the band is successfully added to the database.

requirement_tested: Advertiser registration form capturing advertiser details and ad content uploads
user_persona: An advertiser named Taylor looking to promote her business.
user_goal: Taylor wants to register as an advertiser and upload her ad content.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Advertiser Registration
narrative_steps.description: Taylor visits the registration page and chooses to register as an advertiser.
narrative_steps.action: Go to '/register' and choose 'Advertiser Registration'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An 'Advertiser Registration' form is displayed with fields for Username, Email, Password, Confirm Password, and an upload field for Ad Content.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Advertisement Content
narrative_steps.description: Taylor enters her details, selects an image file for her ad, and submits the registration.
narrative_steps.action: Enter details, upload ad content, and click 'Register Advertiser'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form data and uploaded file are submitted via POST to '/api/advertisers/register', and Taylor's advertiser account is created.

requirement_tested: User authentication system for bands and advertisers with login/logout functionality
user_persona: A registered band member named Riley who wants to access the dashboard.
user_goal: Riley wants to log in to manage his band's profile.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Riley goes to the login page and enters his credentials to access his account.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to '/login', enter username and password, then click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Credentials are sent to '/api/auth/login' via POST, and Riley is redirected to his dashboard after successful authentication.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out
narrative_steps.description: After finishing his work, Riley decides to securely log out of the system.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Logout' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A POST request is made to '/api/auth/logout', and Riley is logged out and redirected to the homepage.

requirement_tested: Band profile pages displaying bio, images, audio players for samples, and embedded YouTube videos
user_persona: A fan named Casey interested in learning about a specific band.
user_goal: Casey wants to view a band's profile and listen to their audio samples.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Band Profile
narrative_steps.description: Casey clicks on a band's name from the browse page to go to their profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a band card from the browse page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The band's profile page loads, displaying the band's name, biography, image, audio players, and embedded YouTube videos.

narrative_steps.title: Playing Audio Samples
narrative_steps.description: Curious about the band's sound, Casey clicks the play button for one of the audio samples.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Play Audio' button next to an audio sample.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected audio sample begins playing in the browser's audio player.

requirement_tested: Advertisement display system integrated throughout the site
user_persona: A casual visitor named Morgan browsing the site.
user_goal: Morgan wants to see advertisements while exploring the website.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Advertisements
narrative_steps.description: While browsing the band listings, Morgan notices rotating advertisements in the sidebar.
narrative_steps.action: Load the '/bands' page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Random advertisements fetched from '/api/advertisements/random' are displayed in designated areas like banners or sidebars.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with an Advertisement
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by an ad, Morgan clicks on it to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an advertisement banner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Morgan is redirected to the advertiser's target URL associated with the clicked advertisement.

requirement_tested: Browse page for users to explore band profiles and listen to audio samples
user_persona: A concert organizer named Jamie searching for new talent.
user_goal: Jamie wants to browse bands and preview their music.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Bands
narrative_steps.description: Jamie visits the browse page to see a list of available bands.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the '/browse' page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid or list of band cards is displayed, each showing the band's image, name, short bio snippet, and a 'Play Audio' button.

narrative_steps.title: Previewing Band Music
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks the 'Play Audio' button on a band card to hear a sample of their music.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Play Audio' button on a band card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected audio sample plays directly from the browse page without navigating away.

requirement_tested: Admin or dashboard views for bands and advertisers to manage their own content
user_persona: A band manager named Devon who needs to update the band's profile.
user_goal: Devon wants to log in and update the band's bio and media links.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Devon logs in and accesses the dashboard to manage the band's content.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and navigate to '/dashboard'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dashboard page loads with tabs for 'My Profile' and 'Manage Content', pre-filled with the band's current information.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Band Information
narrative_steps.description: Devon edits the band's bio and adds a new audio sample link, then saves the changes.
narrative_steps.action: Edit the bio and add a new audio link, then click 'Save Changes'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are sent via PUT request to '/api/bands/me', and the updated information is saved successfully.

requirement_tested: Responsive UI design implementing floral white background and dark goldenrod elements
user_persona: A mobile user named Lee visiting the site on a smartphone.
user_goal: Lee wants to comfortably browse the site on his mobile device with proper styling.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Lee opens the website on his phone to check out some bands.
narrative_steps.action: Open the website on a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The site layout adjusts to fit the mobile screen, with a floral white background (#FFFAF0) and dark goldenrod (#B8860B) accents on buttons and links.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for user registration, login, band data management, and advertisement handling
user_persona: A QA engineer validating API functionality.
user_goal: Verify that the authentication API endpoints function correctly.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Registration Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: The engineer sends a POST request to register a new user.
narrative_steps.action: Send POST request to '/api/auth/register' with valid user data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The API returns a success response and the new user is created in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Login Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: The engineer attempts to log in with the newly created user's credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Send POST request to '/api/auth/login' with correct credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The API responds with an authentication token and success status.

requirement_tested: Media handling for storing and serving band images, audio files, and ad content
user_persona: A backend developer testing media upload and retrieval.
user_goal: Ensure that uploaded media files are stored and retrievable.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Media File
narrative_steps.description: The developer uploads an audio file during a band registration process.
narrative_steps.action: Submit a band registration form including an audio file upload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The file is saved in the '/uploads/' directory with appropriate permissions and the database stores the media URL.

narrative_steps.title: Retrieving Media File
narrative_steps.description: The developer verifies that the uploaded file can be accessed via its stored URL.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to the stored media URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The server serves the requested media file correctly.

requirement_tested: Role-based access control distinguishing between bands, advertisers, and general users
user_persona: A general user named Pat who tries to access restricted content.
user_goal: Pat wants to access the dashboard but doesn't have permission.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: Without logging in, Pat tries to visit the dashboard page.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate directly to '/dashboard' without authentication.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The server redirects Pat to the login page because access to the dashboard requires authentication.

requirement_tested: Package.json scripts: `install:all` for installing frontend and backend dependencies, `dev` for concurrent development startup
user_persona: A new developer setting up the project locally.
user_goal: Set up the development environment quickly using npm scripts.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: The developer clones the repository and runs the script to install all dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Run command 'npm run install:all' in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed successfully in their respective directories.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: The developer starts both frontend and backend servers simultaneously for development.
narrative_steps.action: Run command 'npm run dev'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both the frontend and backend development servers start concurrently, and the application is accessible in the browser.
